comments.text: It would be useful for authors to be able to obtain the path associated with text. This probably means exposing some sort of path object.
comments.raw_text: It would be useful for authors to be able to obtain the path associated with text. This probably means exposing some sort of path object.
There's no point in rushing to add this API until we have good reason to. I'd at least wait until the old canvas backend is gone.
